data.description: get the download size for web resources
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module provides a simple, functional interface to retrieving
    the byte size of a particular resource that LWP can fetch. This size
    may be the size of the resource itself or the sum of the sizes of
    all the files that may be automatically downloaded with the resource
    (such as images). This module reduces all this work to a single
    function call.
